Class OverthereUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebialabs.overthere.util.OverthereUtils

  • public class OverthereUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains a number of static helper methods.

        to - the file to write to.

      • write

         java.lang.String charsetName,

        Writes the contents of a String to an OverthereFile.

        charsetName - the charset to use.
        to - the file to write to.

      • getName

        public static java.lang.String getName(java.lang.String path)
        Returns the name component of a path. The name component is the part after the last slash or backslash.
        Parameters:
        path - the path
        Returns:
        the name component.

      • getBaseName

        public static java.lang.String getBaseName(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the base name of a name (not a path). The base name is the part before the last dot.
        Parameters:
        name - the name
        Returns:
        the base name.

      • getExtension

        public static java.lang.String getExtension(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the extension of a name (not a path). The extension is the part from the last dot in a name onwards. If there is no dot character in the name, this will return an empty string.
        Parameters:
        name - the name
        Returns:
        the extension.

      • constructPath

        public static java.lang.String constructPath(OverthereFile parent,
                             java.lang.String child)
        Construct a new (host) path from a parent directory, and a child.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent directory
        child - The path that should be appended to the parent.
        Returns:
        A newly constructed path.
